sellerCard.description: My name is Andrew and I am a Wordpress developer and UI/UX designer! I'm developing websites for 3.5 years. I will create moder and easy to edit website. Forthemore, your website will be fast and SEO friendly) Also after finnishig our project i will clearly explain how to edit your website to make it easy to use for you.

description.content:
Welcome to my Gig!


Are you looking for Web-Developer and Designer?

You are at right place I am here to design and develop professional site for your business. My main goal to make clients satisfied by my websites.


Gig Requirements:

  • Set hosting for Website(I will help to do it)
  • Content (Text/images/etc.)
  • Color Schemes


My service categories include:

  • Design Creative and Customize Wordpress site
  • Design E-COMMERCE Websites
  • Design a Landing page
  • Custom CSS Code/Java Script Integrations and PHP functionality
  • Using different plugins that will make you website modern and easy to use
  • Add new features or fix bugs in existing site
  • Redesign your existing website take it to next level


Why should you choose me?

  • 100% satisfaction guarantee
  • Unlimited revisions until satisfaction
  • Quick and Easy communication
  • Fully Responsive Mobile Friendly site
  • On-time delivery


Please feel free to ask your queries. I will be happy to help you!

packageList.title: STARTER PACKAGE
packageList.description: Website design, Landing website(1 page), SEO set up, Bug Fixing, Responsive

packageList.title: UPGRADE PACKAGE
packageList.description: Website design, Up to 7 pages, SEO set up, Responsive

packageList.title: ELITE PACKAGE
packageList.description: Up to 8 pages, E-Commerce Functionality, Custom CSS/JS, Advanced features, SEO set up, Responsive

openGraph.title: develop and design wordpress website

reviews.comment: Andrew was excellent to work with. He is professional, intelligent, and committed to helping you with the website. I highly recommend working with Andrew for building out your website. He even gave me a demo so that I can make changes to the website in the future when needed.

Great experience! Highly recommend!

There were some delays due to my technical limitations, so thank you for your patience and help!

Andrew not only did the scope of work but also provided some hints and guides on how to operate with the site and fix it by myself.
I had a great experience with Andrew. I liked that he set up calls to ensure everything was clear throughout the process. Highly recommend!
Great work again. He's my go to for development.

consultationData.description: During our consultation call we will discuss your need for project and make a plan for our future cooperation. Also, I will answer all question you have and clarify everything.
